Agile_Technique.desc: The Bandit becomes more acrobatic, unlocking different methods of movement.

Venom_Shot.desc: Shoots a venom coated projectile. Deals damage over time, and decreases the targets defense. Requires a ranged weapon.

Killer_Jab.desc: Strikes the target, dealing high initial damage and a poison debuff. Requires a physical combat weapon.

Volley.desc: Charge and release skill. Fires a projectile in the air, raining shrapnel within a radius below. Requires a ranged weapon.

Pay_Day.desc: The Bandit stuns the target, additionally causing them to drop currency. Requires a physical combat weapon.

Bomb_Trap.desc: Places an explosive trap that triggers within proximity of nearby targets. Scales off of Range Power.
